dependencies.description:
FFTW is a C subroutine library for computing the discrete Fourier
transform (DFT) in one or more dimensions, of arbitrary input size, and
of both real and complex data (as well as of even/odd data, i.e. the
discrete cosine/sine transforms or DCT/DST). We believe that FFTW, which
is free software, should become the FFT library of choice for most
applications.
dependencies.name: fftw

dependencies.description:
P3DFFT++ (a.k.a. P3DFFT v. 3) is a new generation of P3DFFT library that
aims to provide a comprehensive framework for simulating multiscale
phenomena. It takes the essence of P3DFFT further by creating an
extensible, modular structure uniquely adaptable to a greater range of
use cases.
dependencies.name: p3dfft3

dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.
dependencies.name: py-cython

dependencies.description: Efficient and easy Fast Fourier Transform (FFT) for Python.
dependencies.name: py-fluidfft

dependencies.description:
This package provides Python bindings for the Message Passing Interface
(MPI) standard. It is implemented on top of the MPI-1/MPI-2
specification and exposes an API which grounds on the standard MPI-2 C++
bindings.
dependencies.name: py-mpi4py

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: Make your Python code fly at transonic speeds!
dependencies.name: py-transonic

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
